This is Stephan’s first time performing on stage at Apple Hill Playhouse after Stage Managing last Season’s The Outgoing Tide. Favorite roles include Brandy Bottle Bates in Guys and Dolls at McKeesport Little Theatre, Pontius Pilate in Jesus Christ Superstar and Laertes in Hamlet (both at Chatham University). Next up, Stephan will be Assistant Directing and Stage Managing Death by Fatal Murder. Thank you to Ron F. for the opportunity to be a part of the show and to Rick D. for future artistic endeavors. Break legs to the rest of cast!
